name: Charity Addon for Elementor
author: NicheAddons

sections.description:
Charity Addon for Elementor covers all the must-needed elements for creating a perfect Charity website using Elementor Page Builder. 45+ Unique & Basic Elementor widget covers all of the Charity elements. Including getting a list of donation posts from most popular Charity WordPress plugins. Like, Causes, Campaigns, Countdown, Donors, Donation Form, Donation History, and Donate Buttons.

Learn More About This Plugin

Live Demo One | Live Demo Two | All Elements List

Create a 100% FREE Charity Website

45+ Charity Website Widgets

Each elementor widget crafted based on Charity Websites in Mind. So, this plugin covers all 45+ free must-needed elementor widgets to fulfill your charity website needs. At the same time, it grabs your visitor’s attention. ðŸ™‚

Easy to Customize

User-Friendly wise Elementor is the best choice of Page Builder in WordPress. We assured that same editing experience in our Addons plugin too. Every widget comes with plenty of options with easy to edit user experience.

Professional Support

Our experienced Team supports your every question carefully, and your points/notes will take to the core development team to improving our plugin gradually.

Supported Charity Plugins

  1. Give
  2. Charitable
  3. PayPal Donations
  4. PayPal Donation

45+ Charity Free Widgets & Counting

You can find all of the following 45+ most useful widgets of your Awesome Charity Website.

Basic Widgets

  1. About Me – Name, Profession, Social Media Links, Description, and Button link.
  2. About Us – All Basic Company Details Meta Information, Social Icons, Description, and Alignments.
  3. Blog – Columns up to four, Limit, Order & Order by, Certain Category posts, Certain ID’s, Excerpt and it’s length, Pagination, and more.
  4. Charity Button – Styled Button with necessary fields.
  5. Chart – Contains – Bar and PIE Charts.
  6. Contact – Contact form box, Title, Short Content, and Contact form shortcode.
  7. Gallery – Filter, Title, Subtitle, Positioning Controls, Zoom, and Links.
  8. Get Apps – App Store, Play Store, and Chrome Browser Extension images, and links. Title, Sub-title, and short content.
  9. History – Time or Year, Title, Short Content, and Read More link. With Swappable Image.
  10. Image Compare – Before and After Images with a vertical and horizontal controller.
  11. Process – Includes Three Types of Different Design Layouts, Title, Icon, or Numbers, and Short Content.
  12. Separator – Vertical Alignment and Horizontal Alignment with Headings, Icon, or Text between separator lines.
  13. Services – Five style types of a service element, icon or image, Headings, Short Content and, Read More link.
  14. Slider – Sider animation control, background image uploads, Heading, Short Content and, two buttons.
  15. Subscribe – Title, Short Content with Shortcode Placement area. That you can able to install any third-party subscribe form plugin and include that shortcode into this design.
  16. Table – Easy to add row and columns, Supported multiple inside elements.
  17. Team Single – Name, Profession, Meta Informations, Contact Details, Social Links, and Short Content.
  18. Team – Four Styles, Name, Short Content, Social Links, and Profession.
  19. Testimonials – Three Styles, Images, Content, and Client Name, Professions.
  20. Type Writer – Typing Animation Controls, Speed, and Cursor Controls.
  21. Video – Title, Cover Image with Animated Button – Video Popup.

Charity Specific Widgets

  1. Cause Filter/Slider
  2. Cause List
  3. Countdown
  4. Donation Info
  5. Peoples Needs
  6. Quick Donation
  7. Simple Cause
  8. Slider
  9. Urgent Cause
  10. Donor Wall – Give
  11. Form Grid – Give
  12. Give Form – Give
  13. Goals – Give
  14. History – Give
  15. Login – Give
  16. Profile – Give
  17. Receipt – Give
  18. Register – Give
  19. Totals – Give
  20. PayPal Button
  21. PayPal
  22. Campaigns – Charitable
  23. Donations – Charitable
  24. Donors – Charitable
  25. Form – Charitable
  26. Login – Charitable
  27. Profile – Charitable
  28. Registration – Charitable
  29. Stats – Charitable
sections.installation:
• Make sure you already have a WordPress site and the Elementor plugin installed and activated.

Default Installation

  1. Install “Charity Addon for Elementor” via WordPress plugin directory.
  2. Once installed, Activate “Charity Addon for Elementor.”

Manual Installation

  1. Upload the plugin folder to the “/wp-content/plugins/” directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the “Plugins” screen in WordPress
sections.faq:
This plugin work with any theme?

Yes, for sure! It will work with any theme that “Elementor Page Builder” works.

Is this plugin work without Elementor Page Builder?

No, it’ll not work without Elementor Page Builder, it’s an addon for Elementor.

  • Translation

  • Cause List More Element Options Added
  • Translation

= 1.2.5

  • Scheme_Color & Scheme_Typography Removed
  • Translation

= 1.2.4

  • Give Donation Form Fixes
  • Translation

= 1.2.3

  • People Needs: Icon Color
  • Quick Donation: Color Controls
  • Urgent Cause: Need Counter Control
  • Translation

= 1.2.2

  • Default Placeholder Image Removed
  • Cause Author Image Alignment
  • Translation

= 1.2.1

  • Fake Date on Counter Fixed

= 1.2

  • Supports PHP 5.6 or higher
  • Donation Income & Goal Conditions
  • Minor Improvements & Fixes
  • Translation Updated

= 1.1

  • Countdown Widget Improvements
  • Video Popup Improvements
  • Read Me File

= 1.0

  • Initial release
